name: White Sentence
description:
Who knows what this jailer might be hiding, but who cares!

As long as you manage to serve your sentence in this horror of a prison, you'll be fine.... right..?

If you enjoy this, please consider donating, to support my quest in making the most random things out there.. seriously... I lack a pattern XD

Programming/Art/Sounds and voices/Design : Aroyaki

Some sound effects came from: freesound.org. specific names can be found in the credits.

Special thanks: Mohammad Algald, for being a dummy* (*translation: cool friend)
